issue.title: [C++] Add short representation string to common classes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7964](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7964). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This should apply primarly to DataType, Field, and Schema. It should not try to print things like metadata and nullability. This is not meant for serialization but quick glance.

 
```java

i32
list<i32>
dict<utf8,i8>
struct<<a,i32>,<b,struct<<n,utf8>>>>
schema<<a,i32>>
```
Once we have that, we can have a small print diagnostic to array/tables like R.
